ResearchProjectDef.label: Chemfuel Refining Tier 3
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine deepchem into chemfuel the fastest way possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neutroamine Refining Tier 3
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine deepchem into neutroamine the fastest way possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dye Refining Tier 3
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine chemfuel into dye the fastest way possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Textile Refining III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine deepchem into unrefined fibers, intermediate material from which threads can be woven.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Raw Plasteel Refining III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine raw plasteel from deepchem into usable plasteel. Raw plasteel is useless on its own and can only be cured into plasteel. The process involves using a refinery to extract the impurities, followed by curing the refined plasteel at a smelter.
